thread.section_title: TerraTrike Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TerraTrike | www.terratrike.com
thread.title: Richard Monckton

author: Richard Monckton
title: Richard Monckton
text: Bought my Rover on a whim Aug 2012. I have lower back problems and the recumbent seemed a good choice. Have been over 6000 miles of fun since then. Had two warranty problems and they were taken care of quickly. Finally had to order a new seat as the original was showing wear in a lot of places. Once the season starts I will be on the trike as much as possible. Thanks Terra trike.
